GLOBAL LTDA. - Table with shareholders information: - Columns: APELLIDOS Y NOMBRES RAZON SOCIAL (ACCIONISTAS), TIPO DE DOCUMENTO (NIT, CC, TI), NUMERO DE DOCUMENTO, NUMERO DE CUOTAS, VALOR TOTAL, % DE PARTICIPACION, NACIONALIDAD - Rows with shareholder data: - VILLAFAÑEZ PLANELLS JOSE MIGUEL - CC - 7474165 - 189.140 - 1.891.400.000 - 49,00% - COLOMBIANA - JABBA GALINDO VILMA LEONOR - CC - 22430683 - 189.140 - 1.891.400.000 - 49,00% - COLOMBIANA - VILLAFAÑEZ JABBA JOSE ELIAS - CC - 72302912 - 3.860 - 38.600.000 - 1,00% - COLOMBIANA - VILLAFAÑEZ JABBA ANDRES FELIPE - CC - 1129577148 - 3.860 - 38.600.000 - 1,00% - COLOMBIANA - TOTAL - 386.000 - 3.860.000.000 - 100,00% - "El suscrito contador de la sociedad VP GLOBAL LTDA certifica que la composición accionaria de la compañía a la fecha se encuentra de la siguiente manera:" - "En constancia de lo anterior se firma en Barranquilla a los 23 días del mes de abril de 2021" - KATHERINE CHARRIS ROBLES CONTADOR PUBLICO T.P 194697-T - Contact information for various cities (Barranquilla, Bogotá, Cartagena, Cúcuta, Montería, Riohacha, Santa Marta, Sincelejo, Valledupar) - www.grupovpglobal.com I see this is an official shareholder certification document for VP GLOBAL LTDA, signed by a public accountant in Barranquilla on April 23, 2021. The document details the complete ownership structure, showing four shareholders with their specific equity percentages and personal details. The certification provides a comprehensive breakdown of ownership, including full names, identification numbers, number of shares, total value, participation percentage, and nationality for each shareholder. The total ownership adds up to 100%, with two main shareholders holding 49% each and two minor shareholders holding 1% each. The document clearly represents an ACC (Accionista Composition Certificate) with specific ownership details. It demonstrates the company's shareholding structure through precise percentage breakdowns and shareholder information. The terminology and internal company issuance confirm its classification as an ownership verification document. The key indicators align perfectly with the ACC category definition, showing numerical ownership percentages and using standard shareholder composition language. The internal certification by the company's accountant further validates its authenticity as an ownership record.
